name: Drag Coast Racing
description:
Pick your ride and do a speed race to the finish line!

Switch the gears and gain speed fast to beat your opponent. 24 levels with different opponents, beautiful coast racing tracks, high speed and lots of challenge awaits for you in Drag Coast Racing!

Enjoy and good luck trying to win the tournament! It won't be easy on harder levels, I promise you!

Sounds:
cottonmouth - timeshift
DOCTOR VOX - Frontier
SDDx - Inspiration
freesfx.co.uk
